rows.label: tlk70000015_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The attacks filled us with a sense of
overwhelming gloom and despair...

rows.label: tlk70000015_02_msg0002
rows.name:
So to help cheer us up, Leon and
Azzarn, the traveling performers,
gave us a splendid show.

rows.label: tlk70000015_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They swept from familiar songs of
Iira straight into songs from strange
lands. It touched my old heart, it did.

rows.label: tlk70000015_02_msg0004
rows.name:
While I was listening to their music, all
thoughts of monsters or the attack
flew clean out of my head.

rows.label: tlk70000015_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm sure it was because the performers
were able to share their love of music
with us. It brought us all together.

rows.label: tlk70000015_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Their performance helped me
remember the incredible unifying power
of music.

rows.label: tlk70000015_02_msg0007
rows.name:
I'd like to listen to them play again
someday so that I can appreciate their
skill one more time.
